name: genetracerlite
0:
”Alexa, open gene tracer lite and go to JUN”
”Alexa, open gene tracer lite and find BCL10”
”Alexa, open gene tracer lite and move to YY1”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: gene tracer lite
des: We intend to incorporate voice and genomic information to develop a convenient skill to visualize genomic signal tracks. We download GM12878 histone mark data from Encode data portal and gene annotation v19 from Gencode project. The genome is based on hg19.
